text: The 1944 Copa Ibarguren was the 20° edition of this National cup of Argentina. It was played by the champions of Primera División and the winner of "Copa Presidente de la Nación", a regional competition where Provincial Federations took part."Campeonato Argentino Interligas 1944" by Osvaldo Carluccio crowned during 1944.Argentina - Copa Ibarguren by Osvaldo Gorgazzi at RSSSF Boca Juniors (Primera División champion) faced Federación Tucumana de Fútbol (predecessor of current Liga Tucumana de Fútbol) at Atlético Tucumán stadium in the city of San Miguel de Tucumán. Although they had won their league titles in 1944, the final was played three years later."Copas Interligas 1944" by José Carluccio, 23 Apr 2009 == Match details == {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK || || Pedro Araiz |- |DF || || Pedro Perucca |- |DF || || Clemente Verga |- |MF || || Hernán López |- |MF || || Constancio Rivero |- |MF || || Adolfo Santiago |- |FW || || Francisco Rodríguez |- |FW || || Ricardo Lino Cisterna |- |FW || || Harry Hayes (son) |- |FW || || Ángel De Cicco |- |FW || || Armendáriz |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| |} | {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |- !width=25| !!width=25| |- |GK || || Claudio Vacca |- |DF || || Aurelio Melogno |- |DF || || José Marante |- |MF || || Arcadio López |- |MF || || Ernesto Lazzatti |- |MF |||| Pedro Arico Suárez |- |FW |||| Domingo Gelpi |- |FW |||| Luis Carniglia |- |FW |||| Jaime Sarlanga |- |FW || || Bernardo Gandulla |- |FW || || Julio Rosell |- |colspan=3|Manager: |- |colspan=4| Enrique Sobral |} |} {| width=50% style="font-size: 90%" | |} ==References== Category:Boca Juniors matches Category:1944 in Argentine football Category:1944 in South American football
